languages.text: "Думаю, я знаю, что ее впечатлит, Ваша Светлость. В арсенале хранится замечательная вещица, равно прекрасная и смертоносная, прямо как ваша фаворитка".

"I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, я знаю, что ее впечатлит, Ваша Светлость. В арсенале хранится замечательная вещица, равно прекрасная и смертоносная, прямо как ваша фаворитка".

traits.locale_text: "I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is equally beautiful and deadly, much like your favourite."
"I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is equally beautiful and deadly, much like your favourite."

"I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is equally beautiful and deadly, much like your favourite herself."

"I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is equally beautiful and deadly, much like your favourite herself."

"I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."

"I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."

languages.text: "Ich denke, ich wüsste da etwas, das sie beeindrucken könnte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es gibt da eine Kleinigkeit in Eurem Arsenal, ebenso schön wie tödlich, genau wie Eure Favoritin selbst."
languages.original_text: "I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, ich wüsste da etwas, das sie beeindrucken könnte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es gibt da eine Kleinigkeit in Eurem Arsenal, ebenso schön wie tödlich, genau wie Eure Favoritin selbst."

languages.text: « Je crois savoir ce qui pourrait l'impressionner, Votre Seigneurie. Votre arsenal renferme un étrange petit objet aussi magnifique que mortel... à l'image de votre favorite, donc. »
languages.original_text: "I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."

traits.locale_text: « Je crois savoir ce qui pourrait l'impressionner, Votre Seigneurie. Votre arsenal renferme un étrange petit objet aussi magnifique que mortel... à l'image de votre favorite, donc. »

languages.text: “我想到了一件东西，她肯定会爱不释手，大人。您的武器库里有件奇特的小玩意儿，它既美丽又致命，就像您的爱人一样。”
languages.original_text: "I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."

traits.locale_text: “我想到了一件东西，她肯定会爱不释手，大人。您的武器库里有件奇特的小玩意儿，它既美丽又致命，就像您的爱人一样。”

languages.text: 「あの者に感銘を与えうる品に心当たりがございます、陛下。武器庫に、美しくも致死的な、風変わりで小さい武器がございます。あなた様がお気に召している彼女にふさわしいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女に感銘を与えうる品に心当たりがございます、陛下。武器庫に、あなたがお気に召している彼女と同じく、美しくも致死的な、風変わりで小さい武器がございます」

languages.text: «Creo que ya sé con qué podría impresionarla, {mf|milord|milady}. Hay una cosa extraña en su arsenal que es bella y mortal a partes iguales, al igual que su favorita».
languages.original_text: "I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que ya sé con qué podría impresionarla, {mf|milord|milady}. Hay una cosa extraña en su arsenal que es preciosa y mortal a partes iguales, al igual que su favorita».

languages.text: "Sanırım kendisini etkileyebilecek bir şey biliyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Cephaneliğinizde, tıpkı gözdeniz gibi ölümcül olduğu kadar güzelliğiyle de göz alan nadide bir eşya var."
languages.original_text: "I think I know of something that might impress her, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is a curious little thing in your arsenal that is as beautiful as it is deadly, much like your favourite herself."

traits.locale_text: "Sanırım kendisini etkileyebilecek bir şey biliyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Cephaneliğinizde, tıpkı gözdeniz gibi ölümcül olduğu kadar güzelliğiyle de göz alan nadide bir eşya var."
